segments.text: I notice the woman’s knee-length dress swaying gently as she moves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s something almost serene about her focus on the plate, but it’s unsettling too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are acting so mischievously, it makes me chuckle a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: However, the image of the boy reaching into that jar on a swaying stool is nerve-wracking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t look away, half-expecting him to tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl standing there, raising her hand like a little angel, is so innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel a strange mix of joy and anxiety watching them.
segments.speaker: PAR
